tool_description: Give live gold price in kerala
title: GoldpriceKerala

api_list.name: get goldprice
api_list.description: Fetch daily gold price in kerala
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://goldpricekerala.p.rapidapi.com/get"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "goldpricekerala.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
